sense.def:
One's shoulders
sta dela telesa med vratom in gornjim delom rok.

seg.quote: Sally patted me on the shoulder.

sense.def:
To shoulder something heavy
pomeni naložiti si nekaj težkega na rame, da bi tisto laže nesli.

seg.quote: He shouldered his bundle again and set off.

sense.def:
To shoulder the responsibility or blame for something
pomeni sprejeti odgovornost ali krivdo za nekaj.

seg.quote: The government is expected to shoulder the responsibility for financing the project.
The burden of decision is placed on the shoulders of the individual.

sense.def:
To rub shoulders with famous people
pomeni srečevati slavne ljudi in se pogovarjati z njimi;

A shoulder
je tudi kos mesa z gornjega dela prednje noge živali.
